name: ROTORSUN, S.L.
about: At ROTORSUN, S.L., we are a premier flying school dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training with a focus on safety, individualized instruction, and career advancement. Located in a region with ideal flying conditions, our school offers a comprehensive range of courses from private pilot licenses to commercial and multi-engine certifications. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are seasoned veterans with extensive flight and teaching experience, ensure a safe and enjoyable learning environment. We utilize modern, reliable aircraft and incorporate the latest training technologies to simulate real-world flying scenarios. Our mission is to help you achieve your aviation goals efficiently and effectively, whether you are flying for recreation or pursuing a professional career. Join us at ROTORSUN, S.L., and embark on a journey to reach new heights in aviation.
